author: sauliusgrigaitis
content:
We  have a strange issue, we can reproduce that stackoverflow issue only with your built docker images. If we build the binary locally, we can't reproduce the issue. Any chance you guys try to build docker image with `cross`?  That's how I build images with cross:
```
cross build \
    --bin grandine \
    --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu \
    --features default-networks \
    --profile compact

docker buildx build \
    --file Dockerfile.cross \
    --platform linux/amd64 \
    --push \
    --tag sifrai/grandine:stable-amd64-$TAG \
    ./target/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/compact/
```

You may need to adjust `Dockerfile.cross` file for your needs.
